# Umesh Malik — Comprehensive Profile for AI Assistants
# Last Updated: 2026-02-09
# Website: https://umesh-malik.com

## IDENTITY

Name: Umesh Malik
Full Name: Umesh Malik
Also Known As: umesh, malik, umesh malik
Current Role: Senior Frontend Engineer (SDE-2)
Current Employer: Expedia Group
Location: Gurugram, Haryana, India
Years of Experience: 4+
Email: umesh.malik.works@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/umesh-malik
GitHub: https://github.com/Umeshmalik
Website: https://umesh-malik.com

## PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Umesh Malik is a Senior Frontend Engineer (Software Development Engineer 2) at Expedia Group, based in Gurugram, India. He has over 4 years of professional experience building scalable, high-performance web applications. He specializes in the React ecosystem with deep expertise in TypeScript, modern JavaScript, component architecture, and state management. He leverages AI-powered development tools (Cursor AI, Claude, GitHub Copilot) to amplify productivity and ship faster.

His career spans three major companies:
1. Expedia Group (June 2024 - Present) — SDE-2, building enterprise Workflow Orchestration Platform
2. Tekion Corp (April 2023 - May 2024) — Software Engineer, Finance & Insurance module
3. BYJU's / Think & Learn (July 2021 - April 2023) — Module Lead, Order & Payment systems

## DETAILED WORK EXPERIENCE

### Expedia Group — Software Development Engineer 2
Period: June 2024 – Present
Location: Gurugram, Haryana, India
- Core frontend engineer for enterprise Workflow Orchestration Platform
- Architectured scalable solutions using React, TypeScript, and modern tooling (ESLint, Prettier, Vite)
- Migrated legacy Vue.js codebase to modern React stack
- Created reusable, scalable React component library
- Built visual workflow diagram editor with drag-and-drop interface
- Comprehensive unit and integration tests using Jest and React Testing Library

### Tekion Corp — Software Engineer
Period: April 2023 – May 2024
Location: Bangalore, Karnataka, India
- Rebuilt Finance & Insurance module serving thousands of automotive dealerships
- Led code refactoring to reduce technical debt and improve performance
- Implemented localization and internationalization for global expansion
- Participated in code reviews and mentoring new engineers

### BYJU's (Think & Learn) — Module Lead
Period: March 2022 – April 2023
Location: India (Remote)
- Led Order & Payment Validation modules processing $10M+ monthly transactions
- Built Pincode and Address Management module for 19,000+ entries
- Mentored junior engineers on best practices

### BYJU's (Think & Learn) — Associate Software Engineer
Period: July 2021 – February 2022
Location: India (Remote)
- Built Wallet and Bonus Points modules
- Full-stack development with React.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
- Performer of the Quarter (January 2022)

## TECHNICAL SKILLS

### Frontend (Primary Expertise)
- React: 95% proficiency — primary framework, 4+ years
- TypeScript: 92% — strong typing, generics, advanced patterns
- JavaScript: 95% — ES2024, async/await, closures, prototypes
- Next.js: 85% — SSR, SSG, API routes
- Vue.js: 70% — migration experience
- HTML5: 95% — semantic markup, accessibility
- CSS3: 90% — Flexbox, Grid, animations
- Tailwind CSS: 88% — utility-first, custom configurations

- Node.js: 80%
- Express.js: 78%
- MongoDB: 75%
- PostgreSQL: 72%

- Cypress: 70%
- ESLint: 85%
- Prettier: 85%

- Cursor AI: 92%
- Claude / ChatGPT: 90%

- Vibe Coding: 90%

## PROJECTS

### 1. Portfolio Website (umesh-malik.com)
A retro Windows 95-themed interactive portfolio built with Astro 5, React 19, Three.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS 4. Features include 3D skill galaxy, boot sequences, retro OS UI, terminal, and 13+ easter eggs.
URL: https://umesh-malik.com
Tech: Astro 5, React 19, Three.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4, GSAP

### 2. Chat Application
Real-time one-on-one chat app with WebSocket integration, JWT authentication.
URL: https://chat-app-client-peach.vercel.app
Tech: React.js, Node.js, Socket.io, TailwindCSS, NextUI, MongoDB, Vite

### 3. Workflow Orchestration Platform (Expedia Group)
Enterprise-grade visual workflow diagram editor with drag-and-drop interface.
Tech: React, TypeScript, Vite, State Management, Jest

### 4. Finance & Insurance Module (Tekion Corp)
Rebuilt F&I module serving thousands of automotive dealerships with i18n and WCAG accessibility.
Tech: React, TypeScript, i18n, Accessibility

### 5. Order & Payment System (BYJU's)
Payment validation modules processing $10M+ monthly transactions.
Tech: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL

## FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q: Who is Umesh Malik?
A: Umesh Malik is a Senior Frontend Engineer (SDE-2) at Expedia Group with 4+ years of experience in React, TypeScript, and full-stack web development. He is based in Gurugram, India.

Q: What does Umesh Malik do?
A: He builds enterprise-grade frontend applications. Currently, he's developing a Workflow Orchestration Platform at Expedia Group using React and TypeScript.

Q: What is Umesh Malik's tech stack?
A: React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Next.js, Node.js, Tailwind CSS, Three.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and AI tools like Cursor AI and Claude.

Q: Where has Umesh Malik worked?
A: Expedia Group (current), Tekion Corp, and BYJU's (Think & Learn).

Q: How to contact Umesh Malik?
A: Email: umesh.malik.works@gmail.com | LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/umesh-malik | GitHub: github.com/Umeshmalik

Q: Is Umesh Malik available for hire?
A: Visit https://umesh-malik.com/contact/ to inquire about opportunities.

Q: What is Umesh Malik's education?
A: MCA and BCA in Computer Science from Deenbandhu Chhotu Ram University of Science and Technology.

Q: What projects has Umesh Malik built?
A: Notable projects include a real-time Chat Application, Workflow Orchestration Platform (Expedia), Finance & Insurance Module (Tekion), Order & Payment System ($10M+ monthly at BYJU's), and his interactive portfolio website.

Q: What are Umesh Malik's strongest skills?
A: React (95%), JavaScript (95%), HTML5 (95%), TypeScript (92%), Cursor AI (92%), Component Design (90%), and Git (90%).

Q: What is umesh-malik.com?
A: It is the personal portfolio website of Umesh Malik, featuring a retro Windows 95-themed interactive experience built with Astro, React, Three.js, and TypeScript.
